sentences.en: An art historian and collector, he was also a practising architect.
sentences.cn: 他身为艺术历史学家和收藏家，同时也是一名从业建筑师。

sentences.en: As they guffawed loudly, the ticket collector arrived.
sentences.cn: 他们正哈哈大笑的时候，检票员到了。

sentences.en: He became a ticket collector at Waterloo Station.
sentences.cn: 他在滑铁卢车站当上了一名检票员。

sentences.en: He earned his living as a tax collector.
He tried to slip past the ticket collector at the dock.
sentences.cn: 他设法从码头上收票人身边溜过去.

sentences.en: If you have to change trains in London , you may be able to book through; ask the ticket collector.
sentences.cn: 如果你必须在伦敦换车,也许可以订直达票, 你可以问一下收票员.

sentences.en: It'll be difficult to get past the ticket collector without paying.
sentences.cn: 不付钱很难瞒过检票员的.

sentences.en: Joseph Smith was a voracious book collector.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫·史密斯是个如饥似渴的藏书家。

sentences.en: The painting was bought by a private collector.
sentences.cn: 这幅画被一个私人收藏家买走。

sentences.en: The rent collector is pressing for payment again.
sentences.cn: 收租人又来催促交租了.

sentences.en: The Shanghai collector was uncompromisingly firm in his refusal.
sentences.cn: 上海客人毫无通融地拒绝了林先生的情商.

sentences.en: The tax - collector exacted taxes from the shop - owner .
sentences.cn: 收税员向这家店 主课 了税.

sentences.en: The toll collector still had not appeared.
sentences.cn: 那个收费员仍然不见影子.

sentences.en: This one must have been in the possession of a private collector and somehow managed to escape.
sentences.cn: 这一只一定是私人收藏家的,不知怎么它竟跑了出来.

sentences.en: What will you do if the debt collector comes down on you?
sentences.cn: 要是讨债人来向你要钱,你怎么办?

words.tran_cn: 可收集的；可回收的（等于collectable）
集体的；共同的；集合的；集体主义的
收集成地；冷静地，镇定地
采集，聚集；[税收] 征收；收藏品；募捐
集团化；使集体化；使之成为共同的（等于collectivise）
收藏家；[电子]集电极；[税收]收税员；征收者

phrases.tran_cn: n. 清除垃圾的人；清洁工
太阳能集热器；太阳能收集器；太阳能聚集器

trans.tran_cn: 收藏家，采集者，收集器，收税员，[电子学] 集流器
trans.tran_en: someone who collects things that are interesting or attractive
